QuestData.Title: Dry Powder
QuestData.Description: $n... I did not expect to see you down here.$B$BThe Sashj'tar are... rallying against Jandvik. I had a plan to... decimate them using these old powder kegs.$B$BThe naga proved more formidable to these old bones than I thought.$B$B<Fjolrik coughs out some blood.>$B$BWe haven't much time... to prepare.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Sealed Powder Kegs from the shipwrecks in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: <Fjolrik looks at you weakly.>$B$BYou made it back in time...
